oneOf.description: MongoDB Atlas-hosted cluster configured as a replica set

connection_string.description: The connection string of the cluster that you want to replicate.

database.title: Database Name
database.description: The name of the MongoDB database that contains the collection(s) to replicate.

username.description: The username which is used to access the database.

auth_source.title: Authentication Source
auth_source.description: The authentication source where the user information is stored.  See https://www.mongodb.com/docs/manual/reference/connection-string/#mongodb-urioption-urioption.authSource for more details.

initial_waiting_seconds.title: Initial Waiting Time in Seconds (Advanced)
initial_waiting_seconds.description: The amount of time the connector will wait when it launches to determine if there is new data to sync or not. Defaults to 300 seconds. Valid range: 120 seconds to 1200 seconds.

queue_size.title: Size of the queue (Advanced)
queue_size.description: The size of the internal queue. This may interfere with memory consumption and efficiency of the connector, please be careful.
